citations.narrative:
One cage of 4 breeding sugar gliders did not have water, and the cage had only one small empty water silo type bottle .
The licensee immediately filled the water bottle and two females immediately drank for approximately 5 minutes. The
facility added an additional water bottle to the cage at the time of inspection. Water must be provided to the animals as
necessary to ensure hydration and good health. The facility must ensure that the animals have adequate access to water
at all times.
Corrected immediately.

Animal cages contained excreta and old food on the floor, and there was a strong odor of ammonia in the room. Cleaning
as often as necessary to minimize odors and avoid disease hazards from wastes ensures animal health and welfare. The
facility shall ensure that animal cages are adequately cleaned.
Correct by July 21, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.130  Direct
   
Watering. 
One cage of 4 breeding sugar gliders did not have water, and the cage had only one small empty water silo type bottle . 
The licensee immediately filled the water bottle and two females immediately drank for approximately 5 minutes. The 
facility added an additional water bottle to the cage at the time of inspection. Water must be provided to the animals as 
necessary to ensure hydration and good health. The facility must ensure that the animals have adequate access to water 
at all times.  
 
Corrected immediately. 
3.131(a) 
   
Sanitation. 
Animal cages contained excreta and old food on the floor, and there was a strong odor of ammonia in the room. Cleaning 
as often as necessary to minimize odors and avoid disease hazards from wastes ensures animal health and welfare. The 
facility shall ensure that animal cages are adequately cleaned. 
 
Correct by July 21, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
